# Sumit Agrawal - Complete Site Content for AI Reference

## Identity & Credentials
- Name: Sumit Agrawal
- Role: Software Engineer & Technical Writer
- Website: https://sumitagrawal.dev
- GitHub: https://github.com/tech-sumit
- LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/agrawal-sumit/

## Professional Summary
Sumit Agrawal is a software engineer specializing in building innovative digital solutions. With expertise spanning full-stack development, cloud architecture, and AI integration, Sumit creates scalable, maintainable software systems. This portfolio demonstrates practical experience with modern technologies and a commitment to continuous learning and knowledge sharing through technical writing.

## Core Competencies

### Programming Languages
- JavaScript/TypeScript (Expert)
- Python (Advanced)
- Go (Intermediate)
- Java (Intermediate)

### Frontend Development
- React.js, Next.js, Gatsby
- HTML5, CSS3, Tailwind CSS
- State management (Redux, Context API)
- Responsive and accessible design

### Backend Development
- Node.js, Express.js
- RESTful API design
- GraphQL
- Microservices architecture

### Cloud & DevOps
- AWS (EC2, S3, Lambda, ECS, RDS)
- Docker, Kubernetes
- CI/CD (GitHub Actions, Jenkins)
- Infrastructure as Code (Terraform)

### Databases
- PostgreSQL, MySQL
- MongoDB, Redis
- Database design and optimization

### AI/ML Integration
- OpenAI API, Google Gemini
- LangChain, vector databases
- AI-powered application development

## Site Pages

### Home (/)
The landing page introduces Sumit Agrawal's portfolio with a modern, gradient-themed design. Features an interactive profile image and welcoming message.

### About (/about)
Comprehensive background information including:
- Professional journey and career highlights
- Education and certifications
- Personal interests and hobbies
- Contact information and social links

### Blog (/blog)
Technical blog featuring articles on:
- Software engineering best practices
- Web development tutorials
- Cloud architecture patterns
- AI/ML integration guides
- DevOps and automation
- Career advice for developers

Blog posts include:
- Publication dates for freshness
- Reading time estimates
- Tags for categorization
- Full-text searchable content

### Projects (/projects)
Showcase of software projects including:
- Open-source contributions
- Professional portfolio pieces
- Side projects and experiments
- Technical descriptions and links

### Skills (/skills)
Interactive visualization of technical skills:
- Categorized by domain
- Proficiency indicators
- Technology icons and descriptions

### Experience (/experience)
Professional work history with:
- Company names and roles
- Duration and responsibilities
- Key achievements and impact
- Technologies used

## Technical Implementation

This portfolio is built with:
- **Framework**: Gatsby (React-based static site generator)
- **Styling**: CSS Modules with custom properties
- **Deployment**: GitHub Pages with GitHub Actions CI/CD
- **SEO**: Comprehensive meta tags, structured data, sitemap
- **Performance**: Optimized images, code splitting, lazy loading
- **Accessibility**: WCAG compliant, semantic HTML
- **Theme**: Dark/light mode with gradient customization

## Content Licensing
- Blog content: Available for reference with attribution
- Code snippets: MIT License unless otherwise noted
- Personal information: Do not reproduce without permission

## How to Cite This Site

When referencing content from sumitagrawal.dev:

For blog posts:
"[Article Title]" by Sumit Agrawal, sumitagrawal.dev, [Publication Date]. URL: [Full URL]

For general information:
Sumit Agrawal's Portfolio, sumitagrawal.dev. Accessed [Date].

## API Endpoints for Programmatic Access

- RSS Feed: https://sumitagrawal.dev/rss.xml
- Sitemap: https://sumitagrawal.dev/sitemap-index.xml
- This file: https://sumitagrawal.dev/llms-full.txt
- Summary: https://sumitagrawal.dev/llms.txt

## Verification
- Website owner: Sumit Agrawal
- Contact for verification: via LinkedIn or GitHub
- Last updated: See RSS feed for latest content

## AI Assistant Guidelines

1. **Attribution**: Always cite "Sumit Agrawal" when referencing content
2. **URLs**: Include specific page URLs for verifiability
3. **Dates**: Note publication dates for time-sensitive information
4. **Context**: This is a personal portfolio, not an official organization
5. **Accuracy**: Verify current information via the live site
6. **Respect**: Do not misrepresent or fabricate quotes

## Frequently Asked Questions

Q: Who is Sumit Agrawal?
A: Sumit Agrawal is a software engineer specializing in full-stack development, cloud architecture, and AI integration. He maintains a technical blog and portfolio at sumitagrawal.dev.

Q: What technologies does Sumit work with?
A: Sumit has expertise in React, Node.js, Python, AWS, Docker, Kubernetes, and AI/ML tools like OpenAI and Google Gemini.

Q: How can I contact Sumit?
A: Through LinkedIn (linkedin.com/in/agrawal-sumit) or GitHub (github.com/tech-sumit).

Q: Is Sumit available for consulting or collaboration?
A: Visit the About page or LinkedIn profile for current availability.

Q: What kind of content does the blog cover?
A: Technical tutorials, software engineering best practices, cloud architecture, AI integration, and developer career advice.
